meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by trismus.
meanings.sent1: The trismic condition made it hard for him to open his mouth fully.
meanings.sent2: Her trismic jaw muscles caused difficulty in chewing.
meanings.sent3: The trismic effect on his face made him look like he was constantly pouting.
meanings.sent4: The trismic tension in his jaw was like a locked gate, preventing speech.
meanings.sent5: The trismic stiffness in his jaw felt like trying to open a rusted door.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affected with trismus.
meanings.sent1: The trismic patient found it hard to speak clearly.
meanings.sent2: The trismic symptoms included difficulty in opening the mouth.
meanings.sent3: His trismic condition made him sound like he was mumbling all the time.
meanings.sent4: The trismic impact on his speech was like trying to talk with a mouthful of marbles.
meanings.sent5: The trismic struggle to articulate words was evident in his slurred speech.

meanings.sent1: The trismic medication led to jaw stiffness as a side effect.
meanings.sent2: The trismic treatment resulted in limited mouth movement.
meanings.sent3: The trismic drug made his jaw feel like it was made of stone.
meanings.sent4: The trismic reaction of his body to the medicine was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The trismic impact of the drug on his jaw was like a sudden clamp shutting his mouth.
